fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31860].
  {panel}

!https://ecosystem.atlassian.net/secure/attachment/33783/auitabs.png!

This should be a vertical nav https://developer.atlassian.com/design/latest/vertical-navigation.html

Not using it has caused http://ecosystem.atlassian.net/browse/AUI-1965

Discussed in https://bitbucket.org/atlassian/aui/pull-request/525/aui-1965-revert-changed-selector-in-aui/diff
fields.summary: Use AUI vertical nav instead of mangled AUI tabs

fields.description:
When viewed in an email (such as a page edit notification), the Status Macro does not render correctly. It displays the macro configuration, rather than the rendered macro.

Should probably confirm with the relevant places what the best practice is for this too.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31852].
  {panel}

When copy and pasting a row that has been merged the collumns don't paste correctly.

Example:
Copying the text row with 4 collumns and pasting on the last row results in: (/) expected
!expected.jpeg!
Copying the text row with merged column text and pasting on the last row results in: (x) unexpected (merged column text is pasted on column2)
!unexpected.jpeg!
fields.summary: Table row Copy and Paste of merged cells doesn't work as expected.
Cannot enable Lucidchart add-on for Confluence OnDemand
Confluence could have a macro for Dropbox
Add capability to turn off children error message and make note of this in Conf user guide/admin guide docs

fields.description:
When working with a page with for instance MS-Office documents, the "Insert ‘Office Word’ Macro" fails to list the attached files. 

Clearing the current page name from the "Page Name" field causes the correct files to be listed and chosen by the user.  Please see attached screen shots.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31839].
  {panel}

Currently, the only possible method to implement an announcement banner in Confluence is to create custom HTML into Confluence header as mentioned here:

* [CONF-2758|https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONF-2758]

It would be great if Confluence can retrieve announcement banner automatically from JIRA by a click of a button. Most customer that integrate Confluence and JIRA installed it in the same server, hence the probability of both instances scheduled to be in the same maintenance window is high.

Having this feature will help Confluence and JIRA administrators.
fields.summary: Automatically Implement JIRA's Announcement Banner Into Confluence

fields.description:

See the public page for example: http://confluence.kepler-rominfo.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=5472485 

Available in a lot of Confluence versions.
fields.summary: Code macro not shown on Chrome

fields.description:
Hello,

We face problem using Office Powerpoint macro in Confluence.
Please find our observations below.

-When 'up arrow' shape is used inside ppt, the powerpoint is not at all rendering. It keeps on loading but never completed. Please try attaching the "Up_arrow.pptx".

-When 'up arrow' shape is used and rotated direction pointing downwards,then also same problem occurs .Please try attaching the "Up_arrow_rotated_downwards.pptx".

-When 'down arrow' shape is used and rotated direction pointing upwards,then there is no problem.Please try attaching the "Down_arrow_rotated_upwards.pptx".

Can you please have a look into it and do the needful?

Thanks in advance.
fields.summary: Problem with "Office Powerpoint" macro when 'up arrow' shape is used inside ppt

fields.description:
If I attempt to run Confluence on a platform that doesn't meet the minimum requirements, I get the Confluence Checklist page. This page lists the minimum JVM as "Java Development Kit 1.4 or higher", even though the minimum support JVM on https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/DOC/Supported+Platforms is 1.7

Even though Confluence technically still runs on Java 1.6 (even if it's not supported), this checklist (and the check that lies behind it), should probably be more aggressive than just requiring 1.4.
fields.summary: "Confluence Checklist" still refers to JDK 1.4 as minimum requirement

fields.description:
Renaming the parent page for the children macro will break the children macro, throwing 'Page not found' error.

Fixed as part of https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONF-9293
fields.summary: Renaming Parent Page Used in Children Macro Results in 'Page not found' Error

fields.description:
- Login with "remember me" unchecked.
- Go to view page.
- Open quick editor
- Make sure draft is autosaved at least one.
- ** Restart server **
- Keep doing changes on the document once the server is back.
- The editor is not saving (Chrome console shows 401 errors when posting to heartbeat rest resource)
- When clickin on preview or save, the browser redirects to login page.
- WE JUST LOST DATA!!!

fields.description:
When accessing Confluence 5.4 through a URL other than its configured base URL, the "files attached" icon on the main page view is still rendered using an absolute URL (based on the base) rather than a relative URL. In the situation where the base URL is inaccessible for whatever reason (proxy server issues or whatever), this yields a broken image icon. See the attached screenshot.

In this case, the specific IMG SRC for the icon is "http://localhost:8096/s/en_GB-1988229788/4726/ae47f2be84292af5a42aed58ebcd4cb49e436f6e.1/_/download/resources/com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.confluence-page-banner:page-banner-resources/images/grey_attach.png"

All of the other image assets on the page appear correctly.
fields.summary: Page "attachments" paperclip icon uses absolute URL and is rendered as broken image icon with inaccessible base URL

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa} *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31820]. {panel} There was a change of behaviour from Confluence 4.3.7 to 5.3.4, in Confluence 4.3.7 our body macros used to accept the INLINE output type, however due to the CSS changes that option is no longer available. Find below the instructions on how reproduce this behaviour in our latest version, if you follow these same steps in 4.3.7 you will notice that the macro will be *INLINE* with the text. (i) In my example I used a third party macro, however that behaviour will be the same with any of our bundled body macro. h4.Steps to reproduce: # Start a Confluence 5.3.4. # Go to UPM and install "Confluence Source Editor". # Download [Reporting Plugin|https://marketplace.atlassian.com/plugins/net.customware.confluence.plugin.reporting], can be either from marketplace or UPM. (!) You will also need to get a free license for reporting plugin. # Create a page. # Use source editor and add below code: {code} INLINE content:url and some text here {code} # Once you hit save Confluence will change above code as following: {code} INLINE content:url

and some text here

{code} # In below image you can see that "Some text" will be under the icon instead at the side: !img1.PNG! If you try to use the same code of step 5 in the source editor of Confluence 4.3.7, the code will not be changed and the image will be displayed as this: !img2.png! h4.Workaround: If you edit the page using the UI you can put the "Some text" inside the Report Link block, however that text will be turned into a link: # Editing the page: !img4.PNG! # After saving: !img5.PNG! ps.: I've moved this case from a bug ticket to a feature request on a customers behalf.
fields.summary: Enable Confluence body macros to accept the INLINE atlassian-macro-output-type.

fields.description:
I just upgraded from Confluence 5.2 to 5.3.4 and I am now encountering an issue authenticating users from Active Directory.

Prior to the upgrade the settings were working correctly to authenticate users but after the upgrade I am encountering an error. I can eliminate this error by removing the CN that I had been using to restrict access.

When I add the CN back I get the following errors:

Test get user's memberships : Failed
org.springframework.ldap.NameNotFoundException: [LDAP: error code 32 - 0000208D: NameErr: DSID-0310020A, problem 2001 (NO_OBJECT), data 0, best match of: 'OU=xxxx,DC=mmc,DC=xxx,DC=xxx' ]; nested exception is javax.naming.NameNotFoundException: [LDAP: error code 32 - 0000208D: NameErr: DSID-0310020A, problem 2001 (NO_OBJECT), data 0, best match of: 'OU=xxxx,DC=xxx,DC=xxx,DC=xxx' ]; remaining name 'CN=xxxxxx,OU=xxxxxx,DC=xxx,DC=xxx,DC=xxx'

Test get group members : Failed

Test user can authenticate : Failed
org.springframework.ldap.NameNotFoundException: [LDAP: error code 32 - 0000208D: NameErr: DSID-0310020A, problem 2001 (NO_OBJECT), data 0, best match of: 'OU=xxxxxx,DC=xxx,DC=xxx,DC=xxx' ]; nested exception is javax.naming.NameNotFoundException: [LDAP: error code 32 - 0000208D: NameErr: DSID-0310020A, problem 2001 (NO_OBJECT), data 0, best match of: 'OU=xxxxxx,DC=xxx,DC=xxx,DC=xxx' ]; remaining name 'CN=xxxxxx,OU=xxxxxx,DC=xxx,DC=xxx,DC=xxx'
fields.summary: Error 32 when adding CN in User Directories

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31816].
  {panel}

When using sql query macro with string character inside the future macro:

Error rendering macro 'sql-query' : java.sql.SQLException: Incorrect syntax near '&'.

The query was fine in the edit page, but after i saved it, this error came out.

I tried many times any I found the problem might be caused by the string character inside the query.

e.g.

select * from tableA

where colA = 'abc'

===>   error

select * from tableA

where colB = 5

===>  works
fields.summary: future macro breaks sql query when involving string in the query

fields.description:
The German translation of the text in this message bubble needs to be reviewed by a native speaker. 

Additionally, when creating the string that is displayed there, a distinction should be made that clarifies whether "Ihre" or "Ihren" is needed. Using a slash is not really correct.

Finally, if the button label is "Dismiss" in the English original (which I highly suspect), the translation as "Ablehnen" is incorrect and should be changed to "Verstanden" (understood) or "nicht mehr zeigen" (don't show again).
fields.summary: Errors in German translation of requirements link

fields.description:
I'm trying to install Confluence.

I've installed JIRA. Next I've download and open installer of Confluence. After installation on step "Configure user management" I have information that "Full synchronisation completed successfully." but I'm not able to click Next in the lower left corner.

Basically I'm not able to do anything.
fields.summary: Problem with "Configure user management" screen

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31813].
  {panel}

I'd love to have some refinements to the codeblock parsing of the supported PowerShell highlighter:
- Everything between '<#' and '#>' (not counting the single hyphens) is a comment. even - or rather especially - if it spans multiple lines.
- If behind the command "New-Object" is a string with dots inbetween (like ABC.DEF.GHI), that's a .NET class. Special highlighting for that might be appropriate.
- [ABC.DEF.GHI] is another .NET specific notation
- [ABC.DEF.GHI]::Function() is calling a .NET function (or property, if called without the "()"). Highlighting those function or property-stubs separately would be great
- Functions and their parameters appear to be colored in the same color ("Select-Object -First"). I'd much appreciate if those could be varied, so that functions and parameters have similar colors (Example: Functions get a dark blue and parameters a light blue). Powershell code frequently consists of long chains of Function Pipelines with little but functions and their parameters.
- There is a way in powershell to create a string object across multiple lines: They start with '@"' and end with '"@' (without the single hyphens, but with the double ones). This is not supported in the PowerShell highlighter so far.

All those would be nice-to-have, though hardly worldshaking, features :)
fields.summary: Code Block - Language: PowerShell - Refined code highlighting

fields.description:
Before upgrading to Confluence 5.3, Page Properties Report Macro used to grab **all** the Page Properties Macros from a page. Now it only grabs the last such macro.

NOTE: We used to use the old Metadata macro. Now it was moved to the new name and we see this behavior.
This is essential for one of our internal system which parses the big report table. Now the table only contains a small portion of the data.
fields.summary: Page Properties Report Macro now grabs only one Page Properties Macro from each page.

fields.description:
When a page has an Edit restriction to a user, it can't be reordered right below/above another page with an Edit restriction to another user.

h4. Initial Condition
# Create a space with the following permission: (Page Restrict permission to 'confluence-users' group)
!screenshot-1.JPG!
# Create 2 users under 'confluence-users' group (e.g. : UserA, UserB)
# Create 3 pages under the same parent page (e.g. : Page1, Page2, Page3)
# Set Edit Restriction to the new pages (e.g. : Page1 and Page3 with edit restriction to UserA, Page2 with edit restriction to UserB)

h4. Steps to reproduce
This can be done via {{Space tools >> Content Tools >> Reorder Pages}} in Default Theme or via {{Browse >> Pages (Tree View)}} in Documentation Theme.
h5. Scenario 1
# The initial order of page:
#* Page1
#* Page2
#* Page3
# Move (reorder) Page1 to be below Page 3
# The page order result:
#* Page2
#* Page3
#* Page1
# From this state, UserA can no longer move (reorder) Page1 or Page3 to be above Page2. However, UserA can move (reorder) Page1 and Page3 to be above/below each other.

h5. Scenario 2
# The initial order of page:
#* Page1
#* Page2
#* Page3
# Move (reorder) Page3 to be above Page1
# The page order result:
#* Page3
#* Page1
#* Page3
# From this state, UserA can no longer move (reorder) Page1 or Page3 to be below Page2. However, UserA can move (reorder) Page1 and Page3 to be above/below each other.

h5. Scenario 3
# Create new page on the same level with the existing pages (e.g. : Page4)
# Set Edit Restriction to the new page (e.g. : Page4 with Edit Restriction to UserA)
# The initial order of page:
#* Page1
#* Page2
#* Page3
#* Page4
# UserA cannot move (reorder) Page1 to be right below Page3. However, UserA can move (reorder) Page1 to be below Page4.
# The page order result:
#* Page2
#* Page3
#* Page4
#* Page1
# From this state, UserA can actually move (reorder) Page1 to be below Page3
# The page order result:
#* Page2
#* Page3
#* Page1
#* Page4
fields.summary: Inconsistency when reordering pages with Edit Restriction

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31804].

  {panel}

- Watch page 
- Watch all content on this space

I would like that you guys add also
- Watch new blogposts from this space

Thank you so much!

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31802].
  {panel}

Steps to reproduce:

1. Use the create from template macro to add a button to create Meeting Minutes or Requirements pages.
2. Press the button.
3. You should get the How To wizard - hit next.
4. You get the editor - hit cancel.
5. You should be back on the page you hit the button from.

In Safari, the How To wizard is still displayed. In everything else, it's not there (which is what I'd expect).
fields.summary: How To wizard doesn't disappear when using the create from template macro in Safari.

If I right click -> copy and then paste an image into the editor I can modify the alt text and the title text and everything works fine.

If I highlight an image, then copy and paste it into the editor, I can modify the alt text but changing the title text has no effect. When I change the title text, save the page, then come back into the editor to modify the image properties again, the title text I originally entered is gone.
fields.summary: Title text is not persisted for images that are copy+pasted

fields.description:
since upgrading Confluence to 5.3.4 we get the following exception while confluence tries to send out the daily summary mail:

2013-11-29 00:00:00,658 ERROR [scheduler_Worker-2] [confluence.mail.jobs.DefaultDailyReportManager] queueDailyReportEmail Failed to create daily report for user test
com.atlassian.confluence.renderer.template.TemplateRenderingException: Unable to compile Soy template in plugin module: com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.confluence-daily-summary-email:chrome-template
        at com.atlassian.confluence.plugins.soy.ConfluenceSoyTemplateRenderer.renderTo(ConfluenceSoyTemplateRenderer.java:42)
        at com.atlassian.confluence.renderer.template.DelegatingTemplateRenderer.renderTo(DelegatingTemplateRenderer.java:44)

        at com.atlassian.confluence.mail.template.PreRenderedMailNotificationQueueItem.renderTemplate(PreRenderedMailNotificationQueueItem.java:287)

        at com.atlassian.confluence.mail.template.AbstractMailNotificationQueueItem.preRenderBody(AbstractMailNotificationQueueItem.java:223)
        at com.atlassian.confluence.mail.template.PreRenderedMailNotificationQueueItem$Builder.render(PreRenderedMailNotificationQueueItem.java:498)
        at com.atlassian.confluence.mail.jobs.DefaultDailyReportManager.queueDailyReportEmail(DefaultDailyReportManager.java:134)

fields.description:
Various issues linked to CONF-31489 suggest that the comment save button should say something more comment-y than "Save", such as "Comment" or "Post".


"Comment" seems to be the front-runner.  We can put this onto EAC as soon as 5.4 is out.  It's a trivial change to page-editor.soy and ConfluenceActionSupport.properties but will require translation, hence not fitting into 5.4

A slightly less quick fix we could (probably) work (easily) into the same change is to change the button text to Update (or something) for edits.

CC [~htapia], [~jmasson@atlassian.com], [~nprasad]
fields.summary: Comment Save button should be clearer

fields.description:
h3. Summary

When viewing preview mode when editing a page in a space using documentation theme, the space logo and breadcrumbs are displayed at original size. See attached images for an example.

h3. Steps to Reproduce

# Create a space
# Set it to documentation theme
# Upload a very large logo
# Create or edit a page
# Switch to preview mode

h3. Expected Results

Logo and breadcrumbs are resized to what it should look like when normally viewing the page.

h3. Actual Results

The logo and breadcrumbs are not resized, and look huge, as per the attached screenshots.

h3.Workaround

# Resize the logo before uploading, so that it matches the size it would have been resized to, and thus doesn't display huge in preview mode
# Use the default theme instead of documentation theme, as this is not affected by the bug
fields.summary: Space logo and breadcrumbs are huge when you preview a page in the Doc theme

fields.description:
CONF-31195 describes a scenario whereby a user cannot create a personal space via space blueprints.

It turns out that if the user has a username that used to belong to another (now renamed) user, and that other user created their own personal space, then the new user's attempt will fail.

{{DefaultRequestResolver#validatePersonalSpaceEntity}} in the Create Content Plugin is making an explicit check that a personal space doesn't already exist with the key "~johndoe", and is sending a 400 error if it does.  This is no longer necessary - the {{SpaceManager}} will generate a unique space key if the preferred "~johndoe" one is already taken. 

The check in {{DefaultRequestResolver}} can just be removed.
fields.summary: Invalid space key uniqueness check in create-personal-space REST resource

fields.description:

# Configure Confluence to notify a HipChat channel when a page gets created in a space.
# Create a new Page titled "Steps to fire Bob the Slacker". Don't save it yet.
# Change the restrictions on the page so only you can see it.
# Save the page.
# See the entire HipChat channel get notified that you have created a page called "Steps to fire Bob the Slacker".

The reason I used page permissions is because I didn't want people to know about it. I didn't even know there was HipChat integration in the space. I am sad.
fields.summary: Confluence HipChat integration ignores page permissions, exposing sensitive information

fields.description:
Basically, all usages of the {{org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader}} will lead to a cloning of the CompressingStoredFieldsReader which includes cloning the byte arrays these instances contain. It's not unusual for there to be more than 30 of these per reader, each containing more than 2Mb of byte arrays.

This is a necessary cost of search (although an upgrade to Lucene 4.4+ will reduced that to a max of 32Kb).

The problem comes when many concurrent searches are in flight. And the most common case for this is when Confluence starts to return 500 errors. More and more threads will try to make use of {{com.atlassian.confluence.status.service.DefaultSystemInformationService.getUsageInfo()}} to report the 500 error (see {{com.atlassian.confluence.status.SystemErrorInformationLogger}}). The cost multiplies because as long as at least one thread has an IndexReader in scope all previous IndexReaders will not yet be eligible for GC.

There is a load more information about this "quirk" of Lucene in our internal incident ticket https://extranet.atlassian.com/jira/browse/ADM-45956.

To summarise:
We should stop reporting the size of the index during a 500 event to improve the changes of Confluence recovering and to clarify the forensic process if there is an outage.
fields.summary: Remove getIndexSize from UsageInfo so Confluence can recover better under 'full memory' situations
Inconsistent Label Behavior
It'd be great if we checked effective permissions on a page on save to make sure any mentioned users can see a page.

fields.description:
After the upgrade to 5.3, there are some pdf files which are being rendered blank by the pdf macro. 

This works without problems in a 5.2.5 version.

The attachment in this page can be used to reproduce the behavior.

Steps to reproduce.
1) Attach the pdf file of this ticket to a confluence page
2) Insert a pdf macro and load the pdf file
3) The macro will show a blank page and nothing more.

h3. *workaround*
You can start confluence with `-Dpdf.render.memory.guard.disabled=true` system property in order to disable memory guard. That will make all pdfs to be rendered.
More information on how to set system properties in confluence can be found [here|https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/JoUDCg]

If the PDF doesn't render with the workaround in place, you must delete and recreate the PDF macro after placing the system property above and restarting Confluence.
fields.summary: PDF macro is rendered with blank page when used with scanned PDFs
Can't resize images past 16px

The table of contents does not appear to be inserted, either. The only way to get out of it is to close the page and reopen it in a new window, thus losing the table of contents.
fields.summary: cannot save wiki doc after adding table of contents

  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31755].
  {panel}

Hello,
during a loadtest we are running on our new production system (still not productive to end users), we see search response times are increasing to very high figures, up to 5 minutes.

We have very low CPU utilization on all app nodes and DB node.
We see all other requests are responding fast (few seconds) but search is really slow.

I took several thread dumps and all of them shows the following stack trace:
The call stack is hanging on the following for up to a few minutes:

net.sf.hibernate.impl.SessionImpl.initializeEntity(SessionImpl.java:2243)
net.sf.hibernate.loader.Loader.initializeEntitiesAndCollections(Loader.java:319)
net.sf.hibernate.loader.Loader.doQuery(Loader.java:309)
net.sf.hibernate.loader.Loader.doQueryAndInitializeNonLazyCollections(Loader.java:138)
net.sf.hibernate.loader.Loader.doList(Loader.java:1063)

net.sf.hibernate.impl.SessionImpl.find(SessionImpl.java:1569)
net.sf.hibernate.impl.QueryImpl.list(QueryImpl.java:49)
com.atlassian.confluence.spaces.persistence.dao.hibernate.HibernateSpaceDao$6.doInHibernate(HibernateSpaceDao.java:436)
org.springframework.orm.hibernate.HibernateTemplate.execute(HibernateTemplate.java:370)

com.atlassian.confluence.spaces.DefaultSpaceManager.getAllSpaces(DefaultSpaceManager.java:639)
sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor1487.invoke(Unknown Source)
sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
org.springframework.aop.support.AopUtils.invokeJoinpointUsingReflection(AopUtils.java:307)
org.springframework.aop.framework.ReflectiveMethodInvocation.invokeJoinpoint(ReflectiveMethodInvocation.java:182)
org.springframework.aop.framework.ReflectiveMethodInvocation.proceed(ReflectiveMethodInvocation.java:149)
org.springframework.transaction.interceptor.TransactionInterceptor.invoke(TransactionInterceptor.java:106)
org.springframework.aop.framework.ReflectiveMethodInvocation.proceed(ReflectiveMethodInvocation.java:171)
com.atlassian.spring.interceptors.SpringProfilingInterceptor.invoke(SpringProfilingInterceptor.java:16)
org.springframework.aop.framework.ReflectiveMethodInvocation.proceed(ReflectiveMethodInvocation.java:171)

Any known issue with similar stack trace?

This is critical because the go-live date is Sunday and we will not be able to go live with such a performance.

Best,

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31748].
  {panel}

I started describing this with steps, but it became too complicated. I hope breaking it down as I have below reads clearly and makes sense.

In Documentation Theme:

A. With sidebar shown:

1. Selection of recipients dismisses 'Share pages' dialog

Selecting a recipient in the 'Share pages' dialog has the effect of visually dismissing the pop-up dialog. The dialog's state is still 'invoked'; the Share icon looks the same as when the dialog is active and visible. As clicking on the Share pages icon has no effect at this point, to perform the Share or to add more recipients, you have to click somewhere off of the Share pages icon to change its state back to 'uninvoked'.  Then you can again click on the Share pages icon for the dialog to reappear so that you can click the 'Share' button, or add more recipients by looping through the above first.

2. Removal of recipients also toggles content left<>back

Clicking the trash icon next to a Share pages recipient shifts content left, cropping off the left portion of the content at the sidebar. Compensating white space appears at the right of the content area. The dialog remains stationary over the added white space while the recipient is effectively removed. At this point, removing another recipient, clicking the Cancel button in the Share pages dialog, or clicking outside the dialog restores the shifted content and white space back to normal layout. 


B. With sidebar hidden:

1. 'Share pages' dialog uncomfortably flush right.

See attached share_content_flush for appearance of Share pages dialog when sidebar is hidden in Documentation Theme. The dialog functions properly when the sidebar is hidden; i.e., the problems present when the sidebar is shown, as described above, are no longer present.
fields.summary: 'Share content' dialog doesn't work correctly in Documentation Theme

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31747].
  {panel}

As a user of the Dynamic Task List 2, I would like any task that is added with either a User Mention or Assignment to me to end up in my personal task list.

If i use a standard task list in confluence, the tasks have the ability to show up in my personal task list. This is a great feature, but this task list requires you to edit the page to add a task. The Dynamic Task List 2 is great as I can dynamically add tasks (per its name). But, any task that is assigned to me does not show up in my Personal Task List. Is there a way to make this happen?

Also, it doesn't seem like I can easily do a User Reference using the @ sign like in the rest of confluence, is this something that should work.

This was requested that I add this to support from my Atlassian Answers: https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/136639/dynamic-task-lists-don-t-appear-in-my-personal-task-list
fields.summary: Dynamic Task lists don't appear in my personal task list

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31746].
  {panel}

When a page is created with a "label" and subsequently that page is edited, the label becomes duplicated and as such the page is then shown twice.

Screenshot "Table_List_showing_duplicate_pages.png" shows duplicate pages in table list:

Screenshot "Older_Version_Of_Page.png" shows duplicate page as an old version.

When this page is edited it reverts to the current version. Page is then saved and duplicate is removed temporarily.

When the page is subsequently refreshed the duplicate page returns.

I have not yet been able to create The duplication steps that always result in a duplicate page.

Possibilities are using the "Page Properties" Macro for tagging/labeling pages. Remove this does remove the duplicate, but once added again duplicate returns.
fields.summary: Duplicate Pages (Old Revisions) being shown in tables

fields.description:
h4. Steps to reproduce
# Rename an image file by adding a leading whitespace, e.g. change "foo.jpg" to " foo.jpg".
# On a new Confluence page, drag and drop the image to the editor. The file will be attached and an image macro will be placed on the page, referencing the filename " foo.jpg" (with whitespace)
# Generate a space XML backup
# Delete the space, and import using the space XML backup

h4. Expected behavior
Attachments and pages are imported as-is, and the image shows up on the page

h4. Actual behavior
Leading whitespace is removed from the attachment, while the image macro still references the filename with whitespace, causing "Unknown Attachment" error to appear on the page
fields.summary: Leading white spaces in attachment filenames are stripped on XML import, causing "Unknown Attachment" errors in pages

fields.description:
This bug causes a problem with the JIRA Status Report Blueprint:
https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONF-31637

We should not offer it to customers as an available Blueprint if the version of JIRA they are connected to is below 6.1.1.
fields.summary: Do not offer the JIRA Status Report Blueprint if the JIRA version is below 6.1.1.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-31743].
  {panel}

Currently Confluence is using 128-bit encryption when it is running over SSL:
*  https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/DOC/Running+Confluence+Over+SSL+or+HTTPS

Current known workaround:
* use SSL in front of Apache Webserver or Nginx

h3. Workaround

Our [Default SSL ciphers too weak|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/JIRAKB/Security+tools+report+the+default+SSL+Ciphers+are+too+weak] KB covers this in further detail.
fields.summary: Allow Confluence to have option to enforce 256-bit encryption or higher

fields.description:
h2. Steps to Reproduce:

# Attach excel file into Confluence page
# Use {{viewexcel}} file macro to display the attached excel file
# Configure {{viewexcel}} to display *only* one row and column
## Input "1" into the "Last Row" field
## Input "1" into the "Last Column" field
# Save the page

h2. Expected Results:

Confluence should display only one row and column as configured by putting "1" into "Last Row" and "Last Column" fields

h2. Actual Results:

Confluence still render the whole excel file, ignoring the configured value
fields.summary: Excel Macro Last Row, and Column is Not Working

fields.description: If I search for a label, the files which are tacked with this label are not found. Only when searched with labelText:"label" the files are found. If a page is tacked with the label it woks without it.
fields.summary: Files which are labeld can only be found with the labelText search
Code snippet in developer.atlassian.com horizental scroll funny-ness in Chrome
